description:
Rito encounters a golden haired girl on street.  They begin to talk and Rito buys them taiyuki when suddenly, she attacks!  It seems that both her hands and her golden locks are weapons.  Rito tries to run away, but she pursues him.  It turns out that she is an assassin, know as Golden Darkness, hired to kill him.  Zastin comes to rescue Rito, but this girl is more than he can handle.  Lala shows up, and the girl fight is on.
Source: crunchyroll
